data.name: Land Of Eno
data.detailed_description:
The Land of Eno has a wealth of characters to switch, completely random relic challenges, completely random equipment entries, and completely random equipment enhancement system.
Players can experience the randomness of Roguelike, and at the same time meet the requirements of brushing equipment and strengthening the gameplay of equipment. The Land of Eno also has a wealth of bosses,
Players can brush equipment in random ruins, improve themselves, and then challenge Bosses. Challenge all Bosses to pass the game.

data.short_description: This is a Rogue, action adventure game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
